document_data.caption: ''A spellcaster practices creating an ''electric jolt'' between his fingertips.''
document_data.name: Electric jolt
document_data.mainbody: '''''Electric jolt''''' was a simple [[Arcane magic|arcane]] [[evocation]] [[cantrip]] used by spellcasters in the [[Forgotten Realms]] to create a small jolt of electricity from their fingertips.
document_data.Effects: The jolt could be aimed at a target up to 25 feet away (or further, depending on the skill of the caster), but it did not produce a very powerful shock.
document_data.Components: This spell required both [[Verbal component|verbal]] and [[somatic component]]s.
